question:
Which of the following crops of India will be most affected due to unusual warmer winter?
  1. Wheat
  2. Cotton
  3. Mustard
  4. Groundnut
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Absence of Westerlies and unusual warmer winter in 2015 will affect the production of <u>Rabi crops in India</u>. Out of the given crops, wheat and mustard are rabi crops while cotton and groundnut are kharif crops.
